ValidationRule.description: Apabila Priority High, maka Alasan High (Urgent) harus diisi!
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: TEXT(Priority) == 'High (Urgent/Critical)' && (TEXT(Status) == 'Escalated' || TEXT(Status) == 'Waiting Document' || TEXT(Status) == 'Closed' || TEXT(Status) == 'Working') && TEXT(Reason) == null && Case_Cutoff__c == TRUE && NOT($Permission.RPA)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Apabila Priority High, maka Alasan High (Urgent) harus diisi!
